text: Chennasamudram is a town in Erode district in the state of Tamil Nadu, India. ==Demographics== India census, Chennasamudram had a population of 7353. Males constitute 50% of the population and females 50%. Chennasamudram has an average literacy rate of 64%, higher than the national average of 59.5%; with male literacy of 75% and female literacy of 53%. 8% of the population is under 6 years of age. ==References== Category:Cities and towns in Erode district
title: Chennasamudram
